All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Arena
This class implements an Arena which organizes the currently available enemy players that the user can battle against as well as provide the functionality to start those battles.
Battle
This class implements a Battle which dictates how a fight is run and consequently.
CommandLineUI
This class implements a command line UI that the player interacts with to receive output from the game.
Enemy
This class implements an Enemy which stores information that is needed to fight the player in battle.
GameEnvironment
This class controls all of the objects and information about the current game being played.
Item
This interface defines the functionality required for the items to be used correctly by the wider project.
ItemHeal
This class implements an ItemHeal which can be used as an item by the player to heal their Monsters.
ItemIncHealSpd
This class implements a ItemIncHealSpd which can be used as an item by the player to increase a Monster's current Heal Amount.
ItemIncMaxHP
This class implements an ItemIncMaxHP which can be used as an item by the player to increase a Monster's maximum health by a determined amount.
ItemIncreaseAttack
This class implements an ItemIncreaseAttack which can be used as an item by the player to increase the attack of their Monsters.
Monster
This class implements a Monster which can be purchased by the player using the shop class adding the Monster to the player's squad.
MonsterBuilder
This interface defines the functionality required for the Monster builder pattern to create a usable instance of the monster class for the user player and enemy players.
MonsterBuilderImpl
This class implements the MonsterBuilder interface and is responsible for adding variables defined by MonsterCreator to the Monster currently being built and then building the Monster which can then be used throughout the game.
MonsterCreator
This class is used by other classes as a part of the builder design pattern for making new Monsters.
Player
This class implements a Player which stores all of the information about the person currently playing the game or an in game enemy of the person.
Shop
This class implements a Shop which provides the functionality for the user to buy and sell purchasable items and monsters for gold.
Squad
This class implements a Squad of Monsters that is owned by an instance of the player class.
